alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:28PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County near Bagdad through 500 PM MST... At 427 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bagdad, or 24 miles east of Wikieup, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bagdad. This includes the following highways... State Route 97 between mile markers 160 and 166. State Route 96 between mile markers 0 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
